SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CMBN_INFO WHERE DEL_CHECK = 0

SELECT C.BOARD_NUM, C.CMBN_TITLE, C.CMBN_CONT,C.EMP_NAME, C.WRITE_DATE,C.CMBN_HITS FROM(SELECT C.BOARD_NUM, C.CMBN_TITLE, C.CMBN_CONT,E.EMP_NAME, C.WRITE_DATE,C.CMBN_HITS,C.RNUM FROM(SELECT BOARD_NUM, CMBN_TITLE ,CMBN_CONT, EMP_NUM, CMBN_HITS, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM CMBN_INFO WHERE DEL_CHECK = 0 )C LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE 1=1) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN #{strgstartCount} AND #{strgendCount}

SELECT C.BOARD_NUM, C.CMBN_TITLE, C.CMBN_CONT,C.EMP_NAME, C.WRITE_DATE,C.CMBN_HITS FROM(SELECT C.BOARD_NUM, C.CMBN_TITLE, C.CMBN_CONT,E.EMP_NAME, C.WRITE_DATE,C.CMBN_HITS,C.RNUM FROM(SELECT BOARD_NUM, CMBN_TITLE ,CMBN_CONT, EMP_NUM, CMBN_HITS, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM CMBN_INFO WHERE DEL_CHECK = 1 )C LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE 1=1) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}
SELECT C.BOARD_NUM, C.CMBN_TITLE, C.CMBN_CONT, E.EMP_NAME, C.DEL_CHECK FROM CMBN_INFO C INNER JOIN EMP E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE BOARD_NUM =#{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMBN_INFO( BOARD_NUM, CMBN_TITLE, CMBN_CONT , WRITE_DATE, EMP_NUM, DEL_CHECK, CMBN_HITS) VALUES(CMBN_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title} , #{content} , SYSDATE, #{writer},1, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE CMBN_INFO SET DEL_CHECK = 0 WHERE BOARD_NUM=#{no}
